LetsGetStarted.tenFiveText: mandatory|data|Use Ten Five (105) to report things that have already happened and don't need urgent Police assistance.
LetsGetStarted.provideDetailsText: mandatory|data|You will need to provide a date of birth, email address and a phone number to complete this report.
LetsGetStarted.allowTenText: mandatory|data|Please allow up to 10 min to complete this report.
LetsGetStarted.saveLaterText: mandatory|data|The report cannot be saved to complete later.
LetsGetStarted.call11Text: mandatory|data|Call 111 when you need an emergency response from Police, Fire or Ambulance.
LetsGetStarted.operatorText: mandatory|data|The operator will ask you which service you need and connect you to the right service.
LetsGetStarted.cantDecideText: mandatory|data|If you can't decide if it's a real emergency and you're still worried, call 111 and ask us. We'll help you work out what to do.
LetsGetStarted.txtServiceText: mandatory|data|An emergency TXT service for people with hearing or speech difficulties is available. You can register now for the
